ygData.subject: Re: Cleric armour quest (spoilers wanted)
ygData.msgSnippet: I missed the name, can someone please re-post the name of the person that dorps the belt?
ygData.messageBody:
I missed the name, can someone please re-post the name of the person that
dorps the belt?


On Thu, 14 Oct 1999, Mystik wrote:

> From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>
> i know where he is, finding him without tracking is the problem....and a
> guildmate killed him and did get the belt.....don't think i'll be trading my
> belt for it, but it's decent...adds 5 wis
>
> John E. Maynus wrote:
>
> > From: "John E. Maynus" <jmaynus@...>
> >
> > Just in case you don't know where he is he's somewhere in Dagnor's Cauldron.
> > I heard you get a Reed Belt off him.
> >
> > ****************************************
> > Azor Spellbound
> > Lvl 21 Human Cleric of The Rathe
> > ****************************************
>
> >
